definition: capable of resuming original shape after stretching or compression, a fabric made of yarns containing an elastic material
details:
adjective
- capable of resuming original shape after stretching or compression
- able to adjust readily to different conditions
= synonyms: flexible
noun
- a fabric made of yarns containing an elastic material
- a narrow band of elastic rubber used to hold things, such as papers, together
= example: a narrow band of elastic rubber used to hold things, such as papers, together
= synonyms: rubber band, elastic band
